title: Kareena Kapoor Khan gives us some serious hair goals
text:
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Yianni Tsapatori (@yiannitsapatori) on Aug 7, 2019 at 12:31am PDT

1. Refresh your roots with a dry shampoo. This will also add good volume to the mane.2. Brush your hair and maintain a centre parting of approximately one inch.3. Take two fine section of hair from where the centre parting ends and create two rope braids that fall on either side.4. Pull the hair into a low ponytail and secure it with an elastic hairband.5. Conceal the hairband by wrapping a small section of hair from the ponytail around it.6. Pull out a few strands of baby hair from the either side of your temples and apply a mousse to it for a wispy effect.
description: Kareena Kapoor Khan flaunts a chic hairdo that features rope braids and we help you recreate it in a few simple steps.
